result.eng: Assuming he is right, where does that leave us?
result.ga: Abraimis go bhfuil an ceart aige Cá bhfágann sé sin muidne
result.orig: Abraimis go bhfuil an ceart aige Cá bhfágann sé sin muidne
result.html: Abraimis go bhfuil an ceart aige Cá bhfágann sé sin muidneAssuming he is right, where does that leave us?
result.ponchtml: Abraimis go ḃfuil an ceart aige Cá ḃfágann sé sin muidneAssuming he is right, where does that leave us?

result.eng: Are you okay?
result.ga: An bhfuil sibh ceart go leor
result.orig: An bhfuil sibh ceart go leor
result.html: An bhfuil sibh ceart go leorAre you okay?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil siḃ ceart go leorAre you okay?

result.eng: Do you think that she is right?
result.ga: An dóigh leat go bhfuil an ceart aici
result.orig: An dóigh leat go bhfuil an ceart aici
result.html: An dóigh leat go bhfuil an ceart aiciDo you think that she is right?
result.ponchtml: An dóiġ leat go ḃfuil an ceart aiciDo you think that she is right?

result.eng: Can I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.
result.ga: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leat
result.orig: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leat
result.html: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leatCan I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.
result.ponchtml: An féidir liom laḃairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leatCan I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.

result.eng: Would you like a drink? - Okay.
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat deoch - Ceart go leor
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat deoch - Ceart go leor
result.html: Ar mhaith leat deoch - Ceart go leorWould you like a drink? - Okay.
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat deoċ - Ceart go leorWould you like a drink? - Okay.

result.eng: Was Darwin right about evolution in nature?
result.ga: An raibh an ceart ag Darwin faoin éabhlóid sa dúlra
result.orig: An raibh an ceart ag Darwin faoin éabhlóid sa dúlra
result.html: An raibh an ceart ag Darwin faoin éabhlóid sa dúlraWas Darwin right about evolution in nature?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ an ceart ag Darwin faoin éaḃlóid sa dúlraWas Darwin right about evolution in nature?

result.eng: What does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?
result.ga: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aige
result.orig: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aige
result.html: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aigeWhat does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?
result.ponchtml: Cad a deir sé nuair naċ mbíonn an freagra ceart aigeWhat does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?

result.eng: Alright, I'll get out of your way!
result.ga: Ceart go leor fágfaidh mé an bealach agat
result.orig: Ceart go leor fágfaidh mé an bealach agat
result.html: Ceart go leor fágfaidh mé an bealach agatAlright, I'll get out of your way!
result.ponchtml: Ceart go leor fágfaiḋ mé an bealaċ agatAlright, I'll get out of your way!

result.eng: He is certainly right, but...
result.ga: Is cinnte go bhfuil an ceart aige ach
result.orig: Is cinnte go bhfuil an ceart aige ach
result.html: Is cinnte go bhfuil an ceart aige achHe is certainly right, but...
result.ponchtml: Is cinnte go ḃfuil an ceart aige aċHe is certainly right, but...

result.eng: As for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ga: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.orig: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.html: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat achAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ponchtml: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat aċAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...

result.eng: This is not the correct way to make pancakes!
result.ga: Ní hé seo an bealach ceart chun pancóga a dhéanamh
result.orig: Ní hé seo an bealach ceart chun pancóga a dhéanamh
result.html: Ní hé seo an bealach ceart chun pancóga a dhéanamhThis is not the correct way to make pancakes!
result.ponchtml: Ní hé seo an bealaċ ceart ċun pancóga a ḋéanaṁThis is not the correct way to make pancakes!

result.eng: This is not the right time to talk to me.
result.ga: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liom
result.orig: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liom
result.html: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liomThis is not the right time to talk to me.
result.ponchtml: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le laḃairt liomThis is not the right time to talk to me.

result.eng: I hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ga: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.orig: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.html: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ am ceart agam le taḃairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.

result.eng: You may be right.
result.ga: Seans go bhfuil an ceart agat
result.orig: Seans go bhfuil an ceart agat
result.html: Seans go bhfuil an ceart agatYou may be right.
result.ponchtml: Seans go ḃfuil an ceart agatYou may be right.

result.eng: That is the right answer.
result.ga: Sin é an freagra ceart
result.orig: Sin é an freagra ceart
result.html: Sin é an freagra ceartThat is the right answer.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an freagra ceartThat is the right answer.

result.eng: She calls herself Úna but what is her real name?
result.ga: Tugann sí Úna uirthi féin ach cén t-ainm ceart atá uirthi
result.orig: Tugann sí Úna uirthi féin ach cén t-ainm ceart atá uirthi
result.html: Tugann sí Úna uirthi féin ach cén t-ainm ceart atá uirthiShe calls herself Úna but what is her real name?
result.ponchtml: Tugann sí Úna uirṫi féin aċ cén t-ainm ceart atá uirṫiShe calls herself Úna but what is her real name?

result.eng: I am right but I can't prove it.
result.ga: Tá an ceart agam ach ní féidir é a chruthú
result.orig: Tá an ceart agam ach ní féidir é a chruthú
result.html: Tá an ceart agam ach ní féidir é a chruthúI am right but I can't prove it.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ceart agam aċ ní féidir é a ċruṫúI am right but I can't prove it.

result.eng: You are right.
result.ga: Tá an ceart agat
result.orig: Tá an ceart agat
result.html: Tá an ceart agatYou are right.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ceart agatYou are right.

result.eng: Everything here is okay.
result.ga: Tá gach rud anseo ceart go leor
result.orig: Tá gach rud anseo ceart go leor
result.html: Tá gach rud anseo ceart go leorEverything here is okay.
result.ponchtml: Tá gaċ rud anseo ceart go leorEverything here is okay.

result.eng: You are okay.
result.ga: Tá tú ceart go leor
result.orig: Tá tú ceart go leor
result.html: Tá tú ceart go leorYou are okay.
result.ponchtml: Tá tú ceart go leorYou are okay.

result.eng: That will be okay.
result.ga: Beidh sé sin ceart go leor
result.orig: Beidh sé sin ceart go leor
result.html: Beidh sé sin ceart go leorThat will be okay.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé sin ceart go leorThat will be okay.

result.eng: It's okay.
result.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor
result.orig: Tá sé ceart go leor
result.html: Tá sé ceart go leorIt's okay.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ceart go leorIt's okay.

result.eng: As a result we are alright.
result.ga: Mar sin tá muid ceart go leor
result.orig: Mar sin tá muid ceart go leor
result.html: Mar sin tá muid ceart go leorAs a result we are alright.
result.ponchtml: Mar sin tá muid ceart go leorAs a result we are alright.

result.eng: It's good enough.
result.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor
result.orig: Tá sé ceart go leor
result.html: Tá sé ceart go leorIt's good enough.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ceart go leorIt's good enough.

result.eng: You can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ga: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.orig: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.html: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat cúnaṁ a ṫaḃairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an daṫ ceart a roġnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?
result.ga: Fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní An bhfuil an ceart agam
result.orig: Fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní An bhfuil an ceart agam
result.html: Fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní An bhfuil an ceart agam[Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?
result.ponchtml: Fan go ḃfeice mé - seisear buaċaillí agus ceaṫrar cailíní An ḃfuil an ceart agam[Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?

result.eng: It's okay.
result.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor
result.orig: Tá sé ceart go leor
result.html: Tá sé ceart go leorIt's okay.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ceart go leorIt's okay.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
